title: Chocolate truffle cookies
ingredients: ['100g cooking chocolate, chopped', '170g chocolate chips', '85g butter', '3 eggs', '200g caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '60g plain flour', '2 tablespoons best quality cocoa powder', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '170g chocolate chips']
